Exalted [i](Whenever a creature you control attacks alone, that creature gets +1/+1 until end of turn.)[/i]

Dementia [i](Each card you discard while casting this spell pays for {2}.)[/i]
Draw three cards.

When False Trails enters, each player investigates twice. [i](To investigate, create a colorless Clue artifact token with “{2}, Sacrifice this: Draw a card.”)[/i]
Whenever a player sacrifices a Clue, look at the top card of that player’s library. You may put that card into its owner’s graveyard. [i](Do this before that player draws from the Clue.)[/i]

{T}, Pay 1 life, Sacrifice Azenghul’s Flesh: Search your library for a Demon creature card, exile it, then shuffle. If you control a white Cleric and a red Cleric, put that card onto the battlefield. Otherwise, put it into your hand.

cards.special_text:
Whenever you activate a loyalty ability of Xanigan, the Darkened Cloud, you get an emblem with exalted. [i](Whenever a creature you control attacks alone, that creature gets +1/+1 until end of turn.)[/i]
[+2]: Xanigan deals 2 damage to up to one target and you gain 2 life.
[-3]: You draw three cards and you lose 3 life.
[-7]: Xanigan becomes a 7/7 Demon creature with flying and indestructible that’s still a planeswalker. Prevent all combat damage that would be dealt to her.

Until end of turn, target creature loses all abilities and has base power and toughness 1/1. Draw a card.

Investigate, then sacrifice any number of Clues. Final Wisdom deals 2 damage to target creature or planeswalker for each Clue sacrificed this way. [i](To investigate, create a Clue token. It’s an artifact with “{2}, Sacrifice this artifact: Draw a card.”)[/i]

Dementia [i](Each card you discard while casting this spell pays for {2}.)[/i]

Marrow to Brimstone deals damage to target creature or planeswalker equal to the total number of instant and sorcery cards you own in exile and in your graveyard.

Whenever you discard a card, investigate. [i](Create a Clue token. It’s an artifact with “{2}, Sacrifice this artifact: Draw a card.”)[/i]
Whenever you sacrifice a Clue, add {R}.

Whenever a player discards a creature card, create a token that’s a copy of that card, except it has base power and toughness 1/1, is an Illusion in addition to its other types, and has “Sacrifice this creature at the beginning of your end step.” It gains haste.

Deathtouch
If a player would discard a card, that player discards it, but exiles it instead of putting it into their graveyard. When they do, you may cast it and spend mana as though it was mana of any type to cast it. If you don’t, put it into its owner’s graveyard.

Prowess
Whenever a player discards a card, exile the top card of your library. You may play that card this turn, and it costs {2} less to cast.

Whenever Bane of Flesh deals combat damage to a player, that player discards a card.
When Bane of Flesh dies, investigate. [i](Create a Clue token. It’s an artifact with “{2}, Sacrifice this artifact: Draw a card.”)[/i]

cards.special_text:
Whenever you activate a loyalty ability of Kalmatar, the Hungering Maw, untap each Forest you control.
[+2]: Reveal the top two cards of your library. Put all land cards from among them onto the battlefield and the rest into your hand.
[-2]: Sacrifice another permanent. Draw cards equal to that permanent’s mana value.
[-9]: Return all cards from your graveyard to your hand. You have no maximum hand size for the rest of the game.

cards.special_text:
Whenever you activate a loyalty ability of Barten, the Seeking Scholar, exile the top two cards of your library.
[+1]: Put a card exiled with Barten into its owner’s hand, then discard a card.
[-2]: You may play cards exiled by Barten until your next turn.
[-5]: You get an emblem with “If you would draw a card while your library has no cards in it, you win the game instead.”
